update maple_order
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
driver_id = #{driverId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
payment = #{payment,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
